summary: This document consists of email correspondence primarily between Lesley Groff, Paul Morris, and Amanda Kirby regarding scheduling meetings with Jeffrey Epstein. It highlights the coordination of meetings related to Epstein's financial management with Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and Paul Morris.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is involved in scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein regarding his accounts.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is facilitating communication regarding the meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual with whom the meetings are being scheduled.

connections.description: Lesley Groff and Paul Morris are coordinating meetings related to Jeffrey Epstein's financial management.
Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are collaborating on scheduling meetings with Jeffrey Epstein.
Paul Morris and Amanda Kirby are both involved in the management of Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.
Lesley Groff is coordinating meetings on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein.
Paul Morris is set to meet with Jeffrey Epstein regarding his financial accounts.

events.title: Meeting Confirmation
events.description: Lesley Groff confirms a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein for Paul Morris and his team.

events.title: Planned Meeting Week
events.description: A meeting is being arranged for the week of October 8 when Jeffrey Epstein returns to NYC.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Floor, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: Lesley Groff is coordinating meetings for Jeffrey Epstein.
Paul Morris is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank involved in managing Epstein's accounts.
Amanda Kirby is facilitating the scheduling of meetings with Epstein.
The correspondence indicates a planned meeting for the week of October 8, 2013.
